概率论期末复习

高频期中前考点

设 ξ\xiξ 和 η\etaη 是概率空间 (Ω,F,P)(\Omega, \mathcal{F}, \mathcal{P})(Ω,F,P) 上的可积随机变量, G\mathcal{G}G, G1\mathcal{G}_1G1​, G2\mathcal{G}_2G2​ 是 F\mathcal{F}F 的子 σ\sigmaσ-域, 且 G1⊆G2\mathcal{G}_1 \subseteq \mathcal{G}_2G1​⊆G2​.

(1) 证明: E{E{ξ∣G2}∣G1}=E{ξ∣G1}E\left\{ E\{\xi | \mathcal{G}_2\} | \mathcal{G}_1 \right\} = E\{\xi | \mathcal{G}_1\}E{E{ξ∣G2​}∣G1​}=E{ξ∣G1​}

(2) 证明: 若 ξ\xiξ 和 η\etaη 是有界的, 则

E{ξE{η∣G}}=E{ηE{ξ∣G}};E\{\xi E\{\eta | \mathcal{G}\}\} = E\{\eta E\{\xi | \mathcal{G}\}\}; E{ξE{η∣G}}=E{ηE{ξ∣G}};

(3) 证明: 若 fff 是 B(R)\mathcal{B}(\mathbb{R})B(R) 可测函数且 E{∣f(ξ)∣}<∞E\{|f(\xi)|\} < \inftyE{∣f(ξ)∣}<∞, 则

∫Ωf(ξ)dP=∫Rf(x)dFξ(x)\int_{\Omega} f(\xi)d\mathcal{P} = \int_{\mathbb{R}} f(x)d\mathcal{F}_\xi(x) ∫Ω​f(ξ)dP=∫R​f(x)dFξ​(x)

(4) 证明: 若 D(ξ)<∞D(\xi) < \inftyD(ξ)<∞, 则

D(ξ)=E{D(ξ∣G)}+D(E{ξ∣G})D(\xi) = E\{D(\xi|\mathcal{G})\} + D(E\{\xi|\mathcal{G}\}) D(ξ)=E{D(ξ∣G)}+D(E{ξ∣G})

(5) 若 E{ξ}E\{\xi\}E{ξ} 和 E{η}E\{\eta\}E{η} 存在, 且 E{ξ∣η}=a.s.ηE\{\xi|\eta\} \stackrel{a.s.}{=} \etaE{ξ∣η}=a.s.η 及 E{η∣ξ}=a.s.ξE\{\eta|\xi\} \stackrel{a.s.}{=} \xiE{η∣ξ}=a.s.ξ. 证明 ξ=a.s.η\xi \stackrel{a.s.}{=} \etaξ=a.s.η.

(6) 如果 ξ,η\xi,\etaξ,η 独立, E{ξ}=0E\{\xi\} = 0E{ξ}=0, p≥1p\geq 1p≥1, 证明 E{∣ξ+η∣p}≥E{∣η∣p}E\{|\xi + \eta|^p\} \geq E\{|\eta|^p\}E{∣ξ+η∣p}≥E{∣η∣p}.

多元正态分布的计算与证明

部分计算相关性质
设 ξ⃗∼N(a⃗,B)\vec{\xi}\sim N(\vec{a},B)ξ​∼N(a,B), 其中 a⃗=E(ξ⃗)\vec{a}=E(\vec{\xi})a=E(ξ​), B=cov(ξ⃗,ξ⃗)B=cov(\vec{\xi},\vec{\xi})B=cov(ξ​,ξ​), 若 η⃗=Anmξ⃗+b⃗\vec{\eta}=A_{nm}\vec{\xi}+\vec{b}η​=Anm​ξ​+b, 则 η⃗∼N(Aa⃗+b⃗,ABAT)\vec{\eta}\sim N(A\vec{a}+\vec{b},ABA^T)η​∼N(Aa+b,ABAT);
二元正态分布

p(X,Y)(x,y)=12πσ1σ21−r2exp⁡{−12(1−r2)((x−μ1)2σ12−2r(x−μ1)(y−μ2)σ1σ2+(y−μ2)2σ22)}p_{(X,Y)}(x,y)=\frac{1}{2\pi\sigma_1\sigma_2\sqrt{1-r^2}}\exp\left\{-\frac{1}{2(1-r^2)}\left(\frac{(x-\mu_1)^2}{\sigma_1^2}-\frac{2r(x-\mu_1)(y-\mu_2)}{\sigma_1\sigma_2}+\frac{(y-\mu_2)^2}{\sigma_2^2}\right)\right\} p(X,Y)​(x,y)=2πσ1​σ2​1−r2​1​exp{−2(1−r2)1​(σ12​(x−μ1​)2​−σ1​σ2​2r(x−μ1​)(y−μ2​)​+σ22​(y−μ2​)2​)}

Kolmogorov’s Maximal Ineq

定理 设在 (Ω,F,P)(\Omega,\mathcal{F},\mathcal{P})(Ω,F,P) 上 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立且 D(ξn)<+∞D(\xi_n)<+\inftyD(ξn​)<+∞, 那么

P{ω:max⁡1≤k≤n{∣Sk−E(Sk)∣}≥ϵ}≤D(Sn)ϵ2\mathcal{P} \left\{ \omega:\max_{1\leq k\leq n}\{|S_k-E(S_k)|\}\geq \epsilon \right\}\leq\frac{D(S_n)}{\epsilon^2} P{ω:1≤k≤nmax​{∣Sk​−E(Sk​)∣}≥ϵ}≤ϵ2D(Sn​)​

进一步地, 若 ∣ξn∣≤c|\xi_n|\leq c∣ξn​∣≤c, 则

1−(ϵ+2c)2D(Sn)≤P{ω:max⁡1≤k≤n{∣Sk−E(Sk)∣}≥ϵ}≤D(Sn)ϵ21-\frac{(\epsilon+2c)^2}{D(S_n)}\leq\mathcal{P} \left\{ \omega:\max_{1\leq k\leq n}\{|S_k-E(S_k)|\}\geq \epsilon \right\}\leq\frac{D(S_n)}{\epsilon^2} 1−D(Sn​)(ϵ+2c)2​≤P{ω:1≤k≤nmax​{∣Sk​−E(Sk​)∣}≥ϵ}≤ϵ2D(Sn​)​

此即Kolmogorov’s Maximal Ineq. 当 n=1n=1n=1 时, 即 Chebyshov’s Ineq

P{ω:∣ξ−E(ξ)∣≥ϵ}≤D(ξ)ϵ2\mathcal{P} \left\{ \omega:|\xi-E(\xi)|\geq \epsilon \right\}\leq\frac{D(\xi)}{\epsilon^2} P{ω:∣ξ−E(ξ)∣≥ϵ}≤ϵ2D(ξ)​

证明
Chebyshov’s Ineq 的证明:

P(∣ξ−E(ξ)∣≥ϵ)=∫∣ξ−E(ξ)∣ϵ≥11dP≤∫∣ξ−E(ξ)∣ϵ≥1∣ξ−E(ξ)∣2ϵ2dP≤∫Ω∣ξ−E(ξ)∣2ϵ2dP=1ϵ2E∣ξ−E(ξ)∣2=D(ξ)ϵ2\mathcal{P}(|\xi-E(\xi)|\geq\epsilon)=\int_{\frac{|\xi-E(\xi)|}{\epsilon}\geq1}1d\mathcal{P}\leq\int_{\frac{|\xi-E(\xi)|}{\epsilon}\geq1}\frac{|\xi-E(\xi)|^2}{\epsilon^2}d\mathcal{P}\leq\int_\Omega\frac{|\xi-E(\xi)|^2}{\epsilon^2}d\mathcal{P}=\frac{1}{\epsilon^2}E|\xi-E(\xi)|^2=\frac{D(\xi)}{\epsilon^2} P(∣ξ−E(ξ)∣≥ϵ)=∫ϵ∣ξ−E(ξ)∣​≥1​1dP≤∫ϵ∣ξ−E(ξ)∣​≥1​ϵ2∣ξ−E(ξ)∣2​dP≤∫Ω​ϵ2∣ξ−E(ξ)∣2​dP=ϵ21​E∣ξ−E(ξ)∣2=ϵ2D(ξ)​

Kolmogorov’s Maximal Ineq 的证明:
对于右侧, WLOG, 设 E(ξn)=0E(\xi_n)=0E(ξn​)=0. 记 Bk={ω:∣Sk∣≥ϵ}B_k=\{\omega:|S_k|\geq\epsilon\}Bk​={ω:∣Sk​∣≥ϵ}, 那么即证

P(B)=P(⋃k=1nBk)≤D(Sn)ϵ2\mathcal{P}(B)=\mathcal{P}\left(\bigcup_{k=1}^n B_k\right)\leq \frac{D(S_n)}{\epsilon^2} P(B)=P(k=1⋃n​Bk​)≤ϵ2D(Sn​)​

记 A1=B1A_1=B_1A1​=B1​, Ak=BkBk−1c⋯B1cA_k=B_kB_{k-1}^c\cdots B_1^cAk​=Bk​Bk−1c​⋯B1c​, 则 B=∑k=1nAkB=\sum_{k=1}^n A_kB=∑k=1n​Ak​, 考虑

P(Ak)≤∫AkSk2ϵ2dP=1ϵ2E(Sk2IAk)\mathcal{P}(A_k)\leq\int_{A_k}\frac{S_k^2}{\epsilon^2}d\mathcal{P}=\frac{1}{\epsilon^2}E(S_k^2 I_{A_k}) P(Ak​)≤∫Ak​​ϵ2Sk2​​dP=ϵ21​E(Sk2​IAk​​)

而

E((Sn−Sk)SkIAk)=E(Sn−Sk)E(SkIAk)=∑j=k+1nE(ξj)⋅E(SkIAk)=0E((S_n-S_k)S_kI_{A_k})=E(S_n-S_k)E(S_kI_{A_k})=\sum_{j=k+1}^nE(\xi_j)\cdot E(S_kI_{A_k})=0 E((Sn​−Sk​)Sk​IAk​​)=E(Sn​−Sk​)E(Sk​IAk​​)=j=k+1∑n​E(ξj​)⋅E(Sk​IAk​​)=0

从而

E(Sk2IAk)≤E(Sk2IAk+(Sn−Sk)2IAk)=E((Sk+Sn−Sk)2IAk)=E(Sn2IAk)E(S_k^2I_{A_k})\leq E(S_k^2I_{A_k}+(S_n-S_k)^2I_{A_k})=E((S_k+S_n-S_k)^2I_{A_k})=E(S_n^2I_{A_k}) E(Sk2​IAk​​)≤E(Sk2​IAk​​+(Sn​−Sk​)2IAk​​)=E((Sk​+Sn​−Sk​)2IAk​​)=E(Sn2​IAk​​)

于是

P(B)≤1ϵ2E(Sn2∑k=1nIAk)≤1ϵ2E(Sn2)=D(Sn)ϵ2\mathcal{P}(B)\leq\frac{1}{\epsilon^2}E\left(S_n^2\sum_{k=1}^n I_{A_k}\right)\leq \frac{1}{\epsilon^2}E(S_n^2)=\frac{D(S_n)}{\epsilon^2} P(B)≤ϵ21​E(Sn2​k=1∑n​IAk​​)≤ϵ21​E(Sn2​)=ϵ2D(Sn​)​

对于左侧, 设 ∣ξk∣≤2c|\xi_k|\leq 2c∣ξk​∣≤2c 且 Eξk=0E\xi_k=0Eξk​=0, 定义 BkB_kBk​, AkA_kAk​, BBB 同上, 由 E((Sn−Sk)SkIAk)=0E((S_n-S_k)S_kI_{A_k})=0E((Sn​−Sk​)Sk​IAk​​)=0,

E(SnIB)≤∑k=1nE((Sn−Sk)2IAk)+∑k=1nE(Sk2IAk)E(S_nI_B)\leq\sum_{k=1}^n E((S_n-S_k)^2I_{A_k})+\sum_{k=1}^n E(S_k^2I_{A_k}) E(Sn​IB​)≤k=1∑n​E((Sn​−Sk​)2IAk​​)+k=1∑n​E(Sk2​IAk​​)

由 ∣SkIAk∣=∣(Sk−1+ξk)IAk∣≤(ϵ+2c)P(Ak)|S_kI_{A_k}|=|(S_{k-1}+\xi_k)I_{A_k}|\leq(\epsilon+2c)\mathcal{P}(A_k)∣Sk​IAk​​∣=∣(Sk−1​+ξk​)IAk​​∣≤(ϵ+2c)P(Ak​), 我们有

E(SnIB)≤∑k=1n(∑j=k+1nD(ξj)⋅P(Ak))+(ϵ+2c)2∑k=1nP(Ak)≤∑i=1nD(ξj)∑k=1nP(Ak)+(ϵ+2c)2∑k=1nP(Ak)=(D(Sn)+(ϵ+2c)2)P(B)\begin{aligned} E(S_nI_B) &\leq\sum_{k=1}^n\left(\sum_{j=k+1}^nD(\xi_j)\cdot\mathcal{P}(A_k)\right)+(\epsilon+2c)^2\sum_{k=1}^n\mathcal{P}(A_k)\\ &\leq \sum_{i=1}^nD(\xi_j)\sum_{k=1}^n\mathcal{P}(A_k)+(\epsilon+2c)^2\sum_{k=1}^n\mathcal{P}(A_k)\\ &=(D(S_n)+(\epsilon+2c)^2)\mathcal{P}(B) \end{aligned}E(Sn​IB​)​≤k=1∑n​​j=k+1∑n​D(ξj​)⋅P(Ak​)​+(ϵ+2c)2k=1∑n​P(Ak​)≤i=1∑n​D(ξj​)k=1∑n​P(Ak​)+(ϵ+2c)2k=1∑n​P(Ak​)=(D(Sn​)+(ϵ+2c)2)P(B)​

另一方面,

E(SnIB)=ESn2−E(Sn2IBc)≥ESn2−ϵ2P(Bc)=D(Sn)−ϵ2+ϵ2P(B)E(S_nI_B)=ES_n^2-E(S_n^2I_{B^c})\geq ES_n^2-\epsilon^2\mathcal{P}(B^c)=D(S_n)-\epsilon^2+\epsilon^2\mathcal{P}(B) E(Sn​IB​)=ESn2​−E(Sn2​IBc​)≥ESn2​−ϵ2P(Bc)=D(Sn​)−ϵ2+ϵ2P(B)

由

D(Sn)−ϵ2+ϵ2P(B)≤E(SnIB)≤(D(Sn)+(ϵ+2c)2)P(B)D(S_n)-\epsilon^2+\epsilon^2\mathcal{P}(B)\leq E(S_nI_B)\leq(D(S_n)+(\epsilon+2c)^2)\mathcal{P}(B) D(Sn​)−ϵ2+ϵ2P(B)≤E(Sn​IB​)≤(D(Sn​)+(ϵ+2c)2)P(B)

即得

1−(ϵ+2c)2D(Sn)≤P{ω:max⁡1≤k≤n{∣Sk−E(Sk)∣}≥ϵ}1-\frac{(\epsilon+2c)^2}{D(S_n)}\leq\mathcal{P} \left\{ \omega:\max_{1\leq k\leq n}\{|S_k-E(S_k)|\}\geq \epsilon \right\} 1−D(Sn​)(ϵ+2c)2​≤P{ω:1≤k≤nmax​{∣Sk​−E(Sk​)∣}≥ϵ}

Borel - Cantelli’s Lemma

定理 在 (Ω,F,P)(\Omega,\mathcal{F},\mathcal{P})(Ω,F,P) 上, 设 An∈F,n≥1A_n\in\mathcal{F},n\geq 1An​∈F,n≥1, 那么

(1) 若 ∑n=1∞P(An)<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty \mathcal{P}(A_n)<+\infty∑n=1∞​P(An​)<+∞, 那么 P(lim‾⁡nAn)=0\mathcal{P}(\varlimsup_n A_n)=0P(limn​An​)=0;
(2) 若 AnA_nAn​ 独立, 那么 ∑n=1∞P(An)=+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty \mathcal{P}(A_n)=+\infty∑n=1∞​P(An​)=+∞ 当且仅当 P(lim‾⁡nAn)=1\mathcal{P}(\varlimsup_n A_n)=1P(limn​An​)=1.

证明
(1)

P(lim‾⁡nAn)=P(⋂k=1∞⋃n=k∞An)=lim⁡k→+∞P(⋃n=k∞An)≤lim⁡k→+∞∑n=k∞P(An)=0\mathcal{P}\left(\varlimsup_n A_n\right)=\mathcal{P}\left(\bigcap_{k=1}^\infty \bigcup_{n=k}^\infty A_n\right)=\lim_{k\to+\infty}\mathcal{P}\left(\bigcup_{n=k}^\infty A_n\right)\leq\lim_{k\to+\infty}\sum_{n=k}^\infty\mathcal{P}(A_n)=0 P(nlim​An​)=P(k=1⋂∞​n=k⋃∞​An​)=k→+∞lim​P(n=k⋃∞​An​)≤k→+∞lim​n=k∑∞​P(An​)=0

(2)
“⇐\Leftarrow⇐”: 若 ∑n=1∞P(An)<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty \mathcal{P}(A_n)<+\infty∑n=1∞​P(An​)<+∞, 那么 P(lim⁡nAn)=0\mathcal{P}(\lim_n A_n)=0P(limn​An​)=0;
“⇒\Rightarrow⇒”: 等价于

0=P(lim‾⁡nAnc)=P(⋃k=1∞⋂n=k∞Anc)=lim⁡k→∞P(⋂n=k∞Anc)=lim⁡k→∞∏n=k∞P(Anc)=lim⁡k→∞exp⁡{∑n=k∞log⁡(1−P(An))}≤lim⁡k→∞exp⁡{−c1∑k=1∞P(Ak)}=0\begin{aligned} 0=\mathcal{P}\left(\varliminf_n A_n^c\right)=\mathcal{P}\left(\bigcup_{k=1}^\infty\bigcap_{n=k}^\infty A_n^c\right)&=\lim_{k\to\infty}\mathcal{P}\left(\bigcap_{n=k}^\infty A_n^c\right)\\ &=\lim_{k\to\infty}\prod_{n=k}^\infty \mathcal{P}(A_n^c)\\ &=\lim_{k\to\infty}\exp\left\{\sum_{n=k}^\infty\log(1-\mathcal{P}(A_n))\right\}\\ &\leq \lim_{k\to\infty}\exp\left\{-c_1\sum_{k=1}^\infty\mathcal{P}(A_k)\right\}=0 \end{aligned}0=P(nlim​​Anc​)=P(k=1⋃∞​n=k⋂∞​Anc​)​=k→∞lim​P(n=k⋂∞​Anc​)=k→∞lim​n=k∏∞​P(Anc​)=k→∞lim​exp{n=k∑∞​log(1−P(An​))}≤k→∞lim​exp{−c1​k=1∑∞​P(Ak​)}=0​

SLLN

Thm3, Kolmogorov SLLN 设 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立, 满足

∑n=1∞1n2D(ξn)<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{1}{n^2}D(\xi_n)<+\infty n=1∑∞​n21​D(ξn​)<+∞

那么

1n(Sn−ESn)→a.s.0\frac{1}{n}(S_n-ES_n)\overset{a.s.}{\to}0 n1​(Sn​−ESn​)→a.s.0

即满足 SLLN.

Thm4 设 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立同分布, 满足 E∣ξ1∣<+∞E|\xi_1|<+\inftyE∣ξ1​∣<+∞, 那么 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 满足 SLLN, 即,

E(ξ1∣Sn)=Snn→a.s.a=Eξ1E(\xi_1|S_n)=\frac{S_n}{n}\overset{a.s.}{\to}a=E\xi_1 E(ξ1​∣Sn​)=nSn​​→a.s.a=Eξ1​

若 E∣ξ1∣=+∞E|\xi_1|=+\inftyE∣ξ1​∣=+∞, 则

lim‾⁡n→∞∣Sn∣n=+∞,a.s.\varlimsup_{n\to\infty}\frac{|S_n|}{n}=+\infty,\quad a.s. n→∞lim​n∣Sn​∣​=+∞,a.s.

证明
Thm3, Kolmogorov SLLN 的证明:
我们先证明, 若 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立且 Eξn2<+∞,n≥1E\xi_n^2<+\infty,n\geq 1Eξn2​<+∞,n≥1, 那么如果 ∑n=1∞D(ξn)<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty D(\xi_n)<+\infty∑n=1∞​D(ξn​)<+∞, 则 ∑k=1∞∣ξk−Eξk∣\sum_{k=1}^\infty|\xi_k-E\xi_k|∑k=1∞​∣ξk​−Eξk​∣ a.s. 收敛 (Thm2).

根据上述定理, 由于 ∑n=1∞D(ξnn)=∑n=1∞1n2D(ξn)<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty D(\frac{\xi_n}{n})=\sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{1}{n^2}D(\xi_n)<+\infty∑n=1∞​D(nξn​​)=∑n=1∞​n21​D(ξn​)<+∞, 那么 ∑n=1∞(ξn−Eξnn)\sum_{n=1}^\infty(\frac{\xi_n-E\xi_n}{n})∑n=1∞​(nξn​−Eξn​​) a.s. 收敛, 也即 1n(Sn−ESn)→a.s.0\frac{1}{n}(S_n-ES_n)\overset{a.s.}{\to}0n1​(Sn​−ESn​)→a.s.0.

Thm 4 的证明:
记 ηn=ξnI[−n,n]\eta_n=\xi_n I_{[-n,n]}ηn​=ξn​I[−n,n]​, 那么 ∣ξn∣≤n|\xi_n|\leq n∣ξn​∣≤n, 记 Sn=∑k=1nξkS_n=\sum_{k=1}^n \xi_kSn​=∑k=1n​ξk​, Sn∗=∑k=1nηkS_n^*=\sum_{k=1}^n\eta_kSn∗​=∑k=1n​ηk​, 那么

(1) 证明 ∑n=1∞D(ηn)n2<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{D(\eta_n)}{n^2}<+\infty∑n=1∞​n2D(ηn​)​<+∞, 那么由 Thm 3, 1n(Sn∗−ESn∗)→a.s.0\frac{1}{n}(S_n^*-ES_n^*)\overset{a.s.}{\to}0n1​(Sn∗​−ESn∗​)→a.s.0. 考虑

∑n=1∞D(ηn)n2≤∑n=1∞Eηn2n2=∑n=1∞1n2∫Rx2I[−n,n](x)dFξ1(x)=∑n=1∞1n2∑j=1n∫j−1<∣x∣<jx2dFξ1(x)=∑j=1∞(∫j−1<∣x∣<jx2dFξ1(x))∑n=j∞1n2≤c∑j=1∞1j∫j−1<∣x∣<jx2dFξ1(x)≤c∑j=1∞∫j−1<∣x∣<j∣x∣dFξ1(x)=c∫R∣x∣dFξ1(x)=cE∣ξ1∣<+∞\begin{aligned} \sum_{n=1}^\infty \frac{D(\eta_n)}{n^2}\leq\sum_{n=1}^\infty\frac{E\eta_n^2}{n^2}&=\sum_{n=1}^\infty\frac{1}{n^2}\int_{\mathbb{R}}x^2I_{[-n,n]}(x)d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_1}(x)\\ &=\sum_{n=1}^\infty\frac{1}{n^2}\sum_{j=1}^n \int_{j-1<|x|<j}x^2d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_1}(x)\\ &=\sum_{j=1}^\infty\left( \int_{j-1<|x|<j}x^2d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_1}(x)\right)\sum_{n=j}^\infty\frac{1}{n^2}\\ &\leq c\sum_{j=1}^\infty \frac{1}{j}\int_{j-1<|x|<j}x^2d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_1}(x)\\ &\leq c\sum_{j=1}^\infty \int_{j-1<|x|<j}|x|d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_1}(x)\\ &=c\int_{\mathbb{R}} |x|d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_1}(x)=cE|\xi_1|<+\infty \end{aligned}n=1∑∞​n2D(ηn​)​≤n=1∑∞​n2Eηn2​​​=n=1∑∞​n21​∫R​x2I[−n,n]​(x)dFξ1​​(x)=n=1∑∞​n21​j=1∑n​∫j−1<∣x∣<j​x2dFξ1​​(x)=j=1∑∞​(∫j−1<∣x∣<j​x2dFξ1​​(x))n=j∑∞​n21​≤cj=1∑∞​j1​∫j−1<∣x∣<j​x2dFξ1​​(x)≤cj=1∑∞​∫j−1<∣x∣<j​∣x∣dFξ1​​(x)=c∫R​∣x∣dFξ1​​(x)=cE∣ξ1​∣<+∞​

(2) 证明 ∑n=1∞P{ξn≠ηn}<+∞\sum_{n=1}^\infty\mathcal{P}\{\xi_n\neq\eta_n\}<+\infty∑n=1∞​P{ξn​=ηn​}<+∞, 于是 ∑n=1∞(ξn−ηn)\sum_{n=1}^\infty (\xi_n-\eta_n)∑n=1∞​(ξn​−ηn​) a.s. 收敛, 从而 ξn−ηn→a.s.0\xi_n-\eta_n\overset{a.s.}{\to}0ξn​−ηn​→a.s.0, 从而由 Kronecker’s Lemma (i), 1n(Sn−Sn∗)→a.s.0\frac{1}{n}(S_n-S_n^*)\overset{a.s.}{\to}0n1​(Sn​−Sn∗​)→a.s.0. 实际上

定理 Xn→dX⇔fn(t)≜E(eitXn)→wf(t)≜E(eitX),∀t∈RX_n \xrightarrow{d} X \Leftrightarrow f_n(t) \triangleq E(e^{itX_n}) \xrightarrow{w} f(t) \triangleq E(e^{itX}), \forall t \in \mathbb{R}Xn​d​X⇔fn​(t)≜E(eitXn​)w​f(t)≜E(eitX),∀t∈R.

证明 充分性: 显然, 基于 Second Helly’s Thm, 由于 Xn→dX⇔X_n \xrightarrow{d} X \LeftrightarrowXn​d​X⇔ 对任意的有界连续函数 g(x)g(x)g(x), 有 E(g(Xn))=E(g(X))E(g(X_n)) = E(g(X))E(g(Xn​))=E(g(X)), 而 ∣eitx∣≤1|e^{itx}| \leq 1∣eitx∣≤1 保证了结论成立.

必要性:
1)证明 F^\hat{F}F^ 是一个分布函数.
记 XnX_nXn​ 的分布函数为 FnF_nFn​, XXX 的分布函数为 FFF. 由 First Helly’s Thm, {Xn}\{X_n\}{Xn​} 存在子序列 {Xnk}\{X_{nk}\}{Xnk​} 满足 Fnk→wF^,k→+∞F_{nk} \xrightarrow{w} \hat{F}, k \rightarrow +\inftyFnk​w​F^,k→+∞, 下证 F^\hat{F}F^ 是一个分布函数. 由收敛性知 F^\hat{F}F^ 满足右连续、单调递增条件, 只需证明 F^(−∞)=0,F^(+∞)=1\hat{F}(-\infty) = 0, \hat{F}(+\infty) = 1F^(−∞)=0,F^(+∞)=1.
若存在 a=F^(+∞)−F^(−∞)∈(0,1)a = \hat{F}(+\infty) - \hat{F}(-\infty) \in (0,1)a=F^(+∞)−F^(−∞)∈(0,1), 由于 f(0)=1,ff(0) = 1, ff(0)=1,f 一致连续, 则对任意 ε>0\varepsilon > 0ε>0, 存在 r=r(ε)r = r(\varepsilon)r=r(ε) 使得

12r∫−rrf(t)dt>1−12ε>a+12ε\frac{1}{2r} \int_{-r}^{r} f(t) dt > 1 - \frac{1}{2}\varepsilon > a + \frac{1}{2}\varepsilon 2r1​∫−rr​f(t)dt>1−21​ε>a+21​ε

取 bbb 满足 Fnk(b)−Fnk(−b)<a+14εF_{nk}(b) - F_{nk}(-b) < a + \frac{1}{4}\varepsilonFnk​(b)−Fnk​(−b)<a+41​ε 且 1br<ε4\frac{1}{br} < \frac{\varepsilon}{4}br1​<4ε​, 则有:

12r∫−rrfnk(t)dt=12r∫−rrdt∫ReitxdFnk(x)=12r(∫∣x∣≤bdFnk(x)∫−rreitxdt+∫∣x∣>bdFnk(x)∫−rreitxdt)≤∫∣x∣≤bdFnk(x)+12r∫∣x∣>b∣2sin⁡rxx∣dFnk(x)<∫∣x∣≤bdFnk(x)+1br≤a+12ε\begin{aligned} \frac{1}{2r} \int_{-r}^{r} f_{nk}(t) dt &= \frac{1}{2r} \int_{-r}^r dt \int_{\mathbb{R}} e^{itx} d\mathcal{F}_{nk}(x) \\ &= \frac{1}{2r} \left( \int_{|x| \leq b} d\mathcal{F}_{nk}(x) \int_{-r}^{r} e^{itx} dt + \int_{|x| > b} d\mathcal{F}_{nk}(x) \int_{-r}^{r} e^{itx} dt \right)\\ &\leq \int_{|x| \leq b} d\mathcal{F}_{nk}(x) + \frac{1}{2r} \int_{|x| > b} \left| \frac{2 \sin rx}{x} \right| d\mathcal{F}_{nk}(x) \\ &< \int_{|x| \leq b} d\mathcal{F}_{nk}(x) + \frac{1}{br} \leq a + \frac{1}{2}\varepsilon \end{aligned}2r1​∫−rr​fnk​(t)dt​=2r1​∫−rr​dt∫R​eitxdFnk​(x)=2r1​(∫∣x∣≤b​dFnk​(x)∫−rr​eitxdt+∫∣x∣>b​dFnk​(x)∫−rr​eitxdt)≤∫∣x∣≤b​dFnk​(x)+2r1​∫∣x∣>b​​x2sinrx​​dFnk​(x)<∫∣x∣≤b​dFnk​(x)+br1​≤a+21​ε​

2)证明 F=F^F = \hat{F}F=F^.
由 Second Helly’s Thm 可知 FnkF_{nk}Fnk​ 对应的特征函数在 k→+∞k \rightarrow +\inftyk→+∞ 时收敛到 ∫eitxdF^(x)\int e^{itx} d\mathcal{\hat{F}}(x)∫eitxdF^(x). 又因为 fnk(t)f_{nk}(t)fnk​(t) 逐点收敛到 f(t)=∫eitxdF(x)f(t) = \int e^{itx} d\mathcal{F}(x)f(t)=∫eitxdF(x), 由特征函数的唯一性可知 F=F^F = \hat{F}F=F^.

3)证明 Fn→wFF_n \xrightarrow{w} FFn​w​F.

综合可知结论成立.

定理 设 ξn→dξ,ηn→da∈R\xi_n \xrightarrow{d} \xi, \eta_n \xrightarrow{d} a \in \mathbb{R}ξn​d​ξ,ηn​d​a∈R. 证明: ξn+ηn→dξ+a\xi_n + \eta_n \xrightarrow{d} \xi + aξn​+ηn​d​ξ+a.

证明 我们先证明 Xn→Pa⇔Xn→daX_n \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} a \Leftrightarrow X_n \xrightarrow{d} aXn​P​a⇔Xn​d​a, aaa 为常数. 必要性已证, 只需证充分性,
我们有

P(∣Xn−a∣>ε)=P(Xn>a+ε)+P(Xn<a−ε)=1+P(Xn<a−ε)−P(Xn≤a+ε)≤1+P(Xn<a−ε)−P(Xn<a+ε)\begin{aligned} \mathcal{P}(|X_n - a| > \varepsilon) &= \mathcal{P}(X_n > a + \varepsilon) + \mathcal{P}(X_n < a - \varepsilon) \\ &= 1 + \mathcal{P}(X_n < a - \varepsilon) - \mathcal{P}(X_n \leq a + \varepsilon) \\ &\leq 1 + \mathcal{P}(X_n < a - \varepsilon) - \mathcal{P}(X_n < a + \varepsilon) \end{aligned}P(∣Xn​−a∣>ε)​=P(Xn​>a+ε)+P(Xn​<a−ε)=1+P(Xn​<a−ε)−P(Xn​≤a+ε)≤1+P(Xn​<a−ε)−P(Xn​<a+ε)​

令 n→∞n \to \inftyn→∞, 由依分布收敛的定义, 右式趋于 1+Fa(a−ε)−Fa(a+ε)=01 + F_a(a - \varepsilon) - F_a(a + \varepsilon) = 01+Fa​(a−ε)−Fa​(a+ε)=0. 于是有 lim⁡n→∞P(∣Xn−a∣>ε)=0,∀ε>0\lim_{n \to \infty} \mathcal{P}(|X_n - a| > \varepsilon) = 0, \forall \varepsilon > 0limn→∞​P(∣Xn​−a∣>ε)=0,∀ε>0, 即 Xn→PaX_n \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} aXn​P​a.

回到本题, ηn→Pa\eta_n \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} aηn​P​a. 于是

P(ξn+ηn<x)≤P(ξn+ηn<x,∣ηn−a∣<ε)+P(∣ηn−a∣>ε)\mathcal{P}(\xi_n + \eta_n < x) \leq \mathcal{P}(\xi_n + \eta_n < x, |\eta_n - a| < \varepsilon) + \mathcal{P}(|\eta_n - a| > \varepsilon) P(ξn​+ηn​<x)≤P(ξn​+ηn​<x,∣ηn​−a∣<ε)+P(∣ηn​−a∣>ε)

对事件 {ξn+ηn<x,∣ηn−a∣<ε}\{\xi_n + \eta_n < x, |\eta_n - a| < \varepsilon\}{ξn​+ηn​<x,∣ηn​−a∣<ε}, 有

{ξn+ηn<x,∣ηn−a∣<ε}⊂{ξn<x−a+ε}\{\xi_n + \eta_n < x, |\eta_n - a| < \varepsilon\} \subset \{\xi_n < x - a + \varepsilon\} {ξn​+ηn​<x,∣ηn​−a∣<ε}⊂{ξn​<x−a+ε}

于是取上极限可得

lim‾⁡nP(ξn+ηn<x)≤lim⁡nP(ξn<x−a+ε)=P(ξ<x−a+ε)\varlimsup_n \mathcal{P}(\xi_n + \eta_n < x) \leq \lim_n \mathcal{P}(\xi_n < x - a + \varepsilon) = \mathcal{P}(\xi < x - a + \varepsilon) nlim​P(ξn​+ηn​<x)≤nlim​P(ξn​<x−a+ε)=P(ξ<x−a+ε)

对于下界, 我们有关系

{ξn≤x−a−ε}⊂{∣ηn−a∣>ε}∪{ξn+ηn<x}\{\xi_n \leq x - a - \varepsilon\} \subset \{|\eta_n - a| > \varepsilon\} \cup \{\xi_n + \eta_n < x\} {ξn​≤x−a−ε}⊂{∣ηn​−a∣>ε}∪{ξn​+ηn​<x}

因此

P(ξn+ηn<x)≥P(ξn<x−a−ε)−P(∣ηn−a∣>ε)\mathcal{P}(\xi_n + \eta_n < x) \geq \mathcal{P}(\xi_n < x - a - \varepsilon) - \mathcal{P}(|\eta_n - a| > \varepsilon) P(ξn​+ηn​<x)≥P(ξn​<x−a−ε)−P(∣ηn​−a∣>ε)

取下极限可得

lim‾⁡nP(ξn+ηn<x)≥lim⁡nP(ξn<x−a−ε)=P(ξ<x−a−ε)\varliminf_n \mathcal{P}(\xi_n + \eta_n < x) \geq \lim_n \mathcal{P}(\xi_n < x - a - \varepsilon) = \mathcal{P}(\xi < x - a - \varepsilon) nlim​​P(ξn​+ηn​<x)≥nlim​P(ξn​<x−a−ε)=P(ξ<x−a−ε)

取 x∈CFξ+ax \in C_{F_{\xi+a}}x∈CFξ+a​​, 于是 x−a∈CFξx - a \in C_{F_\xi}x−a∈CFξ​​, 令上述两个式子中 ε→0\varepsilon \to 0ε→0, 即得

lim⁡nP(ξn+ηn<x)=P(ξ+a<x)\lim_n \mathcal{P}(\xi_n + \eta_n < x) = \mathcal{P}(\xi + a < x) nlim​P(ξn​+ηn​<x)=P(ξ+a<x)

也即 ξn+ηn→dξ+a\xi_n + \eta_n \xrightarrow{d} \xi + aξn​+ηn​d​ξ+a.

定理 设 ξn→dξ\xi_n \xrightarrow{d} \xiξn​d​ξ, ηn→d0\eta_n \xrightarrow{d} 0ηn​d​0. 证明: ξnηn→d0\xi_n \eta_n \xrightarrow{d} 0ξn​ηn​d​0.

证明 首先有 ηn→P0\eta_n \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} 0ηn​P​0, 要证 ξnηn→d0\xi_n \eta_n \xrightarrow{d} 0ξn​ηn​d​0, 只需证 ξnηn→P0\xi_n \eta_n \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} 0ξn​ηn​P​0. 每个 ξn\xi_nξn​ 以及 ξ\xiξ 的不连续点是可列的, 因此这些不连续点集的并也是可列的. 因此对固定的 ϵ>0\epsilon > 0ϵ>0, 可取充分大的 AAA, −A∈CFξ∪(⋃n=1∞CFξn)-A \in C_{F_\xi} \cup (\bigcup_{n=1}^{\infty} C_{F_{\xi_n}})−A∈CFξ​​∪(⋃n=1∞​CFξn​​​), 且 P(∣ξ∣>A)<ϵ\mathcal{P}(|\xi| > A) < \epsilonP(∣ξ∣>A)<ϵ. 于是有如下估计:

P(∣ξnηn∣>δ)≤P(∣ξn∣>A)+P(∣ηn∣≥δA)=1−Fξn(A+0)+Fξn(−A)+P(∣ηn∣≥δA)=1−Fξn(A)+Fξn(−A)+P(∣ηn∣≥δA)⟶n→∞1−Fξ(A)+Fξ(−A)=P(∣ξ∣>A)<ϵ\begin{aligned} \mathcal{P}(|\xi_n \eta_n| > \delta) &\leq \mathcal{P}(|\xi_n| > A) + \mathcal{P}\left(\left|\eta_n\right| \geq \frac{\delta}{A}\right)\\ &= 1 - F_{\xi_n}(A+0) + F_{\xi_n}(-A) + \mathcal{P}\left(\left|\eta_n\right| \geq \frac{\delta}{A}\right)\\ &= 1 - F_{\xi_n}(A) + F_{\xi_n}(-A) + \mathcal{P}\left(\left|\eta_n\right| \geq \frac{\delta}{A}\right)\\ &\stackrel{n \to \infty}{\longrightarrow} 1 - F_\xi(A) + F_\xi(-A) = \mathcal{P}(|\xi| > A) < \epsilon \end{aligned}P(∣ξn​ηn​∣>δ)​≤P(∣ξn​∣>A)+P(∣ηn​∣≥Aδ​)=1−Fξn​​(A+0)+Fξn​​(−A)+P(∣ηn​∣≥Aδ​)=1−Fξn​​(A)+Fξn​​(−A)+P(∣ηn​∣≥Aδ​)⟶n→∞​1−Fξ​(A)+Fξ​(−A)=P(∣ξ∣>A)<ϵ​

令 ϵ→0\epsilon \to 0ϵ→0 即得 lim⁡n→∞P(∣ξnηn∣>δ)=0\lim_{n \to \infty} \mathcal{P}(|\xi_n \eta_n| > \delta) = 0limn→∞​P(∣ξn​ηn​∣>δ)=0, 综上命题得证.

收敛性相互推导

定理 ξn→a.s.ξ⇒(1)ξn→Pξ⇒(2)ξn→dξ\xi_n\overset{a.s.}{\to}\xi\overset{(1)}{\Rightarrow}\xi_n\overset{\mathcal{P}}{\to}\xi\overset{(2)}{\Rightarrow}\xi_n\overset{d}{\to}\xiξn​→a.s.ξ⇒(1)ξn​→Pξ⇒(2)ξn​→dξ, ξn→Lpξ⇒(3)ξn→Pξ\xi_n\overset{L^p}{\to}\xi\overset{(3)}{\Rightarrow}\xi_n\overset{\mathcal{P}}{\to}\xiξn​→Lpξ⇒(3)ξn​→Pξ.

证明
对于(1)(3), 由

P(∣ξn−ξ∣≥ϵ)≤E∣ξn−ξ∣pϵp\mathcal{P}(|\xi_n-\xi|\geq\epsilon)\leq\frac{E|\xi_n-\xi|^p}{\epsilon^p} P(∣ξn​−ξ∣≥ϵ)≤ϵpE∣ξn​−ξ∣p​

即知成立.
对于(2), ∀x∈CFξ\forall x\in C_{F_\xi}∀x∈CFξ​​, lim⁡nFξn(x)=Fξ(x)\lim_nF_{\xi_n}(x)=F_{\xi}(x)limn​Fξn​​(x)=Fξ​(x), F(x−0)=lim⁡y↑xFξ(y)−Fξ(x)=lim⁡z↓xFξ(z)F(x-0)=\lim_{y\uparrow x}F_\xi(y)-F_\xi(x)=\lim_{z\downarrow x}F_\xi(z)F(x−0)=limy↑x​Fξ​(y)−Fξ​(x)=limz↓x​Fξ​(z), 我们希望证明

Fξ(y)≤lim‾⁡nFξn(x)≤lim‾⁡nFξn(x)≤Fξ(z),∀y<x<zF_\xi(y)\leq\varliminf_nF_{\xi_n}(x)\leq\varlimsup_nF_{\xi_n}(x)\leq F_\xi(z),\quad\forall y<x<z Fξ​(y)≤nlim​​Fξn​​(x)≤nlim​Fξn​​(x)≤Fξ​(z),∀y<x<z

这样令 y↑xy\uparrow xy↑x 与 z↓xz\downarrow xz↓x, 就有 lim⁡nFξn(x)=F(x)\lim_nF_{\xi_n}(x)=F(x)limn​Fξn​​(x)=F(x). 考虑

Fξ(y)=P(ξ<y)=P(ξ<y,ξn<x)+P(ξ<y,ξn≥x)≤Fξn(x)+P(∣ξn−ξ∣≥x−y)≤lim‾⁡nFξn(x)+lim‾⁡nP(∣ξn−ξ∣≥x−y)≤lim‾⁡nFξn(x)\begin{aligned} F_\xi(y)=\mathcal{P}(\xi<y)&=\mathcal{P}(\xi<y,\xi_n<x)+\mathcal{P}(\xi<y,\xi_n\geq x)\\ &\leq F_{\xi_n}(x)+\mathcal{P}(|\xi_n-\xi|\geq x-y)\\ &\leq \varliminf_n F_{\xi_n}(x)+\varlimsup_n\mathcal{P}(|\xi_n-\xi|\geq x-y)\\ &\leq \varliminf_n F_{\xi_n}(x) \end{aligned}Fξ​(y)=P(ξ<y)​=P(ξ<y,ξn​<x)+P(ξ<y,ξn​≥x)≤Fξn​​(x)+P(∣ξn​−ξ∣≥x−y)≤nlim​​Fξn​​(x)+nlim​P(∣ξn​−ξ∣≥x−y)≤nlim​​Fξn​​(x)​

另一方面,

Fξn(x)=P(ξn≤x)≤P(ξ<z)+P(∣ξn−ξ∣≥∣z−x∣)F_{\xi_n}(x)=\mathcal{P}(\xi_n\leq x)\leq\mathcal{P}(\xi<z)+\mathcal{P}(|\xi_n-\xi|\geq|z-x|) Fξn​​(x)=P(ξn​≤x)≤P(ξ<z)+P(∣ξn​−ξ∣≥∣z−x∣)

于是

lim‾⁡nFξn(x)≤Fξ(z)\varlimsup_nF_{\xi_n}(x)\leq F_\xi(z) nlim​Fξn​​(x)≤Fξ​(z)

这就证明了结论.

收敛性中的反例

依概率收敛不一定 a.s. 收敛:
记 Ω=(0,1)\Omega=(0,1)Ω=(0,1), F=B(R)\mathcal{F}=\mathcal{B}(\mathbb{R})F=B(R), dP=dxd\mathcal{P}=dxdP=dx, 记

ηij={1,ω∈[j−1i,ji)0,otherwise\eta_{ij}=\begin{cases}1,\quad \omega\in\left[\frac{j-1}{i},\frac{j}{i}\right)\\0,\quad\mathrm{otherwise}\end{cases} ηij​={1,ω∈[ij−1​,ij​)0,otherwise​

记 ξ1=η11,ξ2=η21,ξ3=η22,⋯\xi_1=\eta_{11},\xi_2=\eta_{21},\xi_3=\eta_{22},\cdotsξ1​=η11​,ξ2​=η21​,ξ3​=η22​,⋯, ξ=0\xi=0ξ=0, 此时

P(∣ξn−0∣>ϵ)=P(ω:ω∈[j−1in,jin))=1in→0\mathcal{P}(|\xi_n-0|>\epsilon)=\mathcal{P}\left(\omega:\omega\in\left[\frac{j-1}{i_n},\frac{j}{i_n}\right)\right)=\frac{1}{i_n}\to0 P(∣ξn​−0∣>ϵ)=P(ω:ω∈[in​j−1​,in​j​))=in​1​→0

依概率收敛, 但是有子列 ξn′=1\xi_{n'}=1ξn′​=1, 不 a.s. 收敛.

a.s. 收敛不一定 LpL^pLp 收敛:
记 Ω=(0,1)\Omega=(0,1)Ω=(0,1), F=B(R)\mathcal{F}=\mathcal{B}(\mathbb{R})F=B(R), dP=dxd\mathcal{P}=dxdP=dx, 记

ξn={cn,ω∈[0,1n)0,otherwise\xi_n=\begin{cases}c_n,\quad \omega\in\left[0,\frac{1}{n}\right)\\0,\quad\mathrm{otherwise}\end{cases} ξn​={cn​,ω∈[0,n1​)0,otherwise​

ξ=0\xi=0ξ=0, 易知 ξn→a.s.ξ\xi_n\overset{a.s.}{\to}\xiξn​→a.s.ξ, 但取 cn=2nc_n=2^ncn​=2n, 此时 E∣ξnp∣=2npn→+∞E|\xi_n^p|=\frac{2^{np}}{n}\to+\inftyE∣ξnp​∣=n2np​→+∞, 故不 LpL^pLp 收敛.

弱收敛不一定依概率收敛:
取 {ξn,ξ}\{\xi_n,\xi\}{ξn​,ξ} 独立同分布, ξ∼(1−11212)\xi\sim\begin{pmatrix}1&-1\\\frac{1}{2}&\frac{1}{2}\end{pmatrix}ξ∼(121​​−121​​), 那么 Fξn=FξF_{\xi_n}=F_\xiFξn​​=Fξ​, 即 ξn→dξ\xi_n\overset{d}{\to}\xiξn​→dξ, 而

P(∣ξn−ξ∣>1)=P(ξ=1,ξn=−1)+P(ξ=−1,ξn=1)=12>0\mathcal{P}(|\xi_n-\xi|>1)=\mathcal{P}(\xi=1,\xi_n=-1)+\mathcal{P}(\xi=-1,\xi_n=1)=\frac{1}{2}>0 P(∣ξn​−ξ∣>1)=P(ξ=1,ξn​=−1)+P(ξ=−1,ξn​=1)=21​>0

故不依概率收敛.

CLT

定理

首先有三个易证的不等式:

∣ez−1−z∣≤∣z∣2,∣z∣≤1(C)|e^z-1-z|\leq|z|^2,\quad|z|\leq1\quad(C) ∣ez−1−z∣≤∣z∣2,∣z∣≤1(C)

据此, 第一项

∣∏k=1nfξk(t)−∏k=1n(1−12t2σk2Bn2)∣≤(B)∑k=1n∣fξnk(t)−(1−12t2σk2Bn2)∣=∑k=1n∣E(eitξnk−1−itξnk−12t2ξnk2)∣≤(A)∑k=1nE(min⁡{∣tξnk∣2,∣tξnk∣3})≤∑k=1n∫∣x∣≥τ∣tx∣2dFξnk(x)+∑k=1n∫∣x∣<τ∣tx∣3dFξnk(x)≤t2∑k=1n∫∣x∣≥τx2dFξnk(x)+∣t∣3τ∑k=1n∫Rx2dFξnk(x)\begin{aligned} \left|\prod_{k=1}^n f_{\xi_k}(t)-\prod_{k=1}^n\left(1-\frac{1}{2}t^2\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right)\right| &\overset{(B)}{\leq}\sum_{k=1}^n\left|f_{\xi_{nk}}(t)-\left(1-\frac{1}{2}t^2\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right)\right|\\ &=\sum_{k=1}^n\left|E\left(e^{it\xi_{nk}}-1-it\xi_{nk}-\frac{1}{2}t^2\xi_{nk}^2\right)\right|\\ &\overset{(A)}{\leq}\sum_{k=1}^nE\left(\min\left\{|t\xi_{nk}|^2,|t\xi_{nk}|^3\right\}\right)\\ &\leq \sum_{k=1}^n\int_{|x|\geq\tau}|tx|^2d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_{nk}}(x)+\sum_{k=1}^n\int_{|x|<\tau}|tx|^3d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_{nk}}(x)\\ &\leq t^2\sum_{k=1}^n\int_{|x|\geq\tau}x^2d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_{nk}}(x)+|t|^3\tau\sum_{k=1}^n\int_{\mathbb{R}}x^2d\mathcal{F}_{\xi_{nk}}(x) \end{aligned}​k=1∏n​fξk​​(t)−k=1∏n​(1−21​t2Bn2​σk2​​)​​≤(B)​k=1∑n​​fξnk​​(t)−(1−21​t2Bn2​σk2​​)​=k=1∑n​​E(eitξnk​−1−itξnk​−21​t2ξnk2​)​≤(A)​k=1∑n​E(min{∣tξnk​∣2,∣tξnk​∣3})≤k=1∑n​∫∣x∣≥τ​∣tx∣2dFξnk​​(x)+k=1∑n​∫∣x∣<τ​∣tx∣3dFξnk​​(x)≤t2k=1∑n​∫∣x∣≥τ​x2dFξnk​​(x)+∣t∣3τk=1∑n​∫R​x2dFξnk​​(x)​

令 n→∞n\to\inftyn→∞ 与 τ→0\tau\to0τ→0, 即知其趋于 0.\
对于第二项,

∣∏k=1n(1−12t2σk2Bn2)−∏k=1nexp⁡{−12σk2Bn2t2}∣≤∑k=1n∣exp⁡{−12σk2Bn2t2}−(1−12t2σk2Bn2)∣≤(C)∑k=1n∣−t22σk2Bn2∣≤14t4max⁡{σk2Bn2}∑k=1nσk2Bn2=14max⁡1≤k≤n{σk2Bn2}→0,n→∞\begin{aligned} \left|\prod_{k=1}^n\left(1-\frac{1}{2}t^2\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right)-\prod_{k=1}^n\exp\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}t^2\right\}\right| &\leq \sum_{k=1}^n\left|\exp\left\{-\frac{1}{2}\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}t^2\right\}-\left(1-\frac{1}{2}t^2\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right)\right|\\ &\overset{(C)}{\leq}\sum_{k=1}^n\left|-\frac{t^2}{2}\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right|\\ &\leq \frac{1}{4}t^4\max\left\{\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right\}\sum_{k=1}^n\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\\ &=\frac{1}{4}\max_{1\leq k\leq n}\left\{\frac{\sigma_k^2}{B_n^2}\right\}\to0,\quad n\to\infty \end{aligned}​k=1∏n​(1−21​t2Bn2​σk2​​)−k=1∏n​exp{−21​Bn2​σk2​​t2}​​≤k=1∑n​​exp{−21​Bn2​σk2​​t2}−(1−21​t2Bn2​σk2​​)​≤(C)​k=1∑n​​−2t2​Bn2​σk2​​​≤41​t4max{Bn2​σk2​​}k=1∑n​Bn2​σk2​​=41​1≤k≤nmax​{Bn2​σk2​​}→0,n→∞​

从而结论成立.

题目

例 设 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立同分布, Eξ1=0E\xi_1=0Eξ1​=0, D(ξ1)=1D(\xi_1)=1D(ξ1​)=1, 设 {νn}\{\nu_n\}{νn​} 是取值为正整数的随机变量且

νnn→Pc\frac{\nu_n}{n}\overset{\mathcal{P}}{\to}c nνn​​→Pc

其中 c∈(0,+∞)c\in(0,+\infty)c∈(0,+∞) 为常数.
那么

Sνnνn→dζ∼N(0,1)\frac{S_{\nu_n}}{\sqrt{\nu_n}}\overset{d}{\to}\zeta\sim N(0,1) νn​​Sνn​​​→dζ∼N(0,1)

证明 考虑

Sνnνn=(S[cn][cn]+Sνn−S[cn][cn])[cn]νn\frac{S_{\nu_n}}{\sqrt{\nu_n}}=\left(\frac{S_{[cn]}}{\sqrt{[cn]}}+\frac{S_{\nu_n}-S_{[cn]}}{\sqrt{[cn]}}\right)\sqrt{\frac{[cn]}{\nu_n}} νn​​Sνn​​​=([cn]​S[cn]​​+[cn]​Sνn​​−S[cn]​​)νn​[cn]​​

由题设 [cn]νn→P1\sqrt{\frac{[cn]}{\nu_n}}\overset{\mathcal{P}}{\to}1νn​[cn]​​→P1, 而由定理 S[cn][cn]→dζ∼N(0,1)\frac{S_{[cn]}}{\sqrt{[cn]}}\overset{d}{\to}\zeta\sim N(0,1)[cn]​S[cn]​​→dζ∼N(0,1),
因此只需证明

Sνn−S[cn][cn]→P0\frac{S_{\nu_n}-S_{[cn]}}{\sqrt{[cn]}}\overset{\mathcal{P}}{\to}0 [cn]​Sνn​​−S[cn]​​→P0

对于给定 ϵ∈(0,1)\epsilon\in(0,1)ϵ∈(0,1), 记 an=((1−ϵ3)[cn])a_n=((1-\epsilon^3) [cn] )an​=((1−ϵ3)[cn]), bn=((1+ϵ3)[cn])−1b_n=((1+\epsilon^3) [cn] )-1bn​=((1+ϵ3)[cn])−1, Λ={ω:an≤νn(ω)≤bn}\Lambda=\{\omega:a_n\leq\nu_n(\omega)\leq b_n\}Λ={ω:an​≤νn​(ω)≤bn​}, 由题设, ∃n0(ϵ)\exists n_0(\epsilon)∃n0​(ϵ), 当 n≥n0(ϵ)n\geq n_0(\epsilon)n≥n0​(ϵ) 时, P(Λ)≥1−ϵ\mathcal{P}(\Lambda)\geq 1-\epsilonP(Λ)≥1−ϵ.
若 ω∈Λ\omega\in\Lambdaω∈Λ, 那么 Sνn(ω)(ω)S_{\nu_n(\omega)}(\omega)Sνn​(ω)​(ω) 是 {Sj,an≤j≤bn}\{S_j,a_n\leq j\leq b_n\}{Sj​,an​≤j≤bn​} 其中之一, 对于 [cn]<j≤bn[cn]<j\leq b_n[cn]<j≤bn​, 有

Sj−S[cn]=ξ[cn]+1+ξ[cn]+2+⋯+ξjS_j-S_{[cn]}=\xi_{[cn]+1}+\xi_{[cn]+2}+\cdots+\xi_j Sj​−S[cn]​=ξ[cn]+1​+ξ[cn]+2​+⋯+ξj​

由 Kolmogorov Ineq,

P(max⁡[cn]≤j≤bn∣Sj−S[cn]∣>ϵcn)≤σ2(Sbn−S[cn])ϵ2cn≤ϵ3[cn]ϵ2cn≤ϵ\mathcal{P}\left(\max_{[cn]\leq j\leq b_n}|S_j-S_{[cn]}| >\epsilon\sqrt{cn}\right)\leq\frac{\sigma^2(S_{b_n}-S_{[cn]})}{\epsilon^2 cn}\leq\frac{\epsilon^3[cn]}{\epsilon^2cn}\leq\epsilon P([cn]≤j≤bn​max​∣Sj​−S[cn]​∣>ϵcn​)≤ϵ2cnσ2(Sbn​​−S[cn]​)​≤ϵ2cnϵ3[cn]​≤ϵ

对于 an≤j<[cn]a_n\leq j<[cn]an​≤j<[cn] 同理, 结合两式,

P(max⁡an≤j≤bn∣Sj−S[cn]∣>ϵcn)≤2ϵ\mathcal{P}\left(\max_{a_n\leq j\leq b_n}|S_j-S_{[cn]}|>\epsilon\sqrt{cn}\right)\leq 2\epsilon P(an​≤j≤bn​max​∣Sj​−S[cn]​∣>ϵcn​)≤2ϵ

从而当 n≥n0(ϵ)n\geq n_0(\epsilon)n≥n0​(ϵ) 时,

P(∣Sνn−S[cn][cn]∣>ϵ)=∑j=1∞P(νn=j;∣Sνn−S[cn][cn]∣>ϵ)≤∑an≤j≤bnP(νn=j;max⁡an≤j≤bn∣Sj−S[cn]∣>ϵ[cn])+∑j∉[an,bn]P(νn=j)≤P(max⁡an≤j≤bn∣Sj−S[cn]∣>ϵ[cn])+P(νn∉[an,bn])≤2ϵ+1−P(Λ)≤3ϵ\begin{aligned} \mathcal{P}\left(\left|\frac{S_{\nu_n}-S_{[cn]}}{\sqrt{[cn]}}\right|>\epsilon\right) &=\sum_{j=1}^\infty\mathcal{P}\left(\nu_n=j;\left|\frac{S_{\nu_n}-S_{[cn]}}{\sqrt{[cn]}}\right|>\epsilon\right)\\ &\leq \sum_{a_n\leq j\leq b_n}\mathcal{P}\left(\nu_n=j;\max_{a_n\leq j\leq b_n}|S_j-S_{[cn]}|>\epsilon\sqrt{[cn]}\right)+\sum_{j\notin[a_n,b_n]}\mathcal{P}(\nu_n=j)\\ &\leq \mathcal{P}\left(\max_{a_n\leq j\leq b_n}|S_j-S_{[cn]}|>\epsilon\sqrt{[cn]}\right)+\mathcal{P}(\nu_n\notin[a_n,b_n])\\ &\leq 2\epsilon+1-\mathcal{P}(\Lambda)\leq 3\epsilon \end{aligned}P(​[cn]​Sνn​​−S[cn]​​​>ϵ)​=j=1∑∞​P(νn​=j;​[cn]​Sνn​​−S[cn]​​​>ϵ)≤an​≤j≤bn​∑​P(νn​=j;an​≤j≤bn​max​∣Sj​−S[cn]​∣>ϵ[cn]​)+j∈/[an​,bn​]∑​P(νn​=j)≤P(an​≤j≤bn​max​∣Sj​−S[cn]​∣>ϵ[cn]​)+P(νn​∈/[an​,bn​])≤2ϵ+1−P(Λ)≤3ϵ​

于是结论成立.

例 设 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立, 满足 CLT, 证明 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 满足大数定律的充要条件是

1n2∑k=1nD(ξk)→0\frac{1}{n^2}\sum_{k=1}^nD(\xi_k)\to 0 n21​k=1∑n​D(ξk​)→0

证明 “⇐\Leftarrow⇐” 显然, 下证 “⇒\Rightarrow⇒” 成立.

考虑 kn=1n(Sn−ESn)→0k_n=\frac{1}{n}(S_n-ES_n)\to0kn​=n1​(Sn​−ESn​)→0, 而

ηn=Sn−ESnD(Sn)→dζ∼N(0,1)⇒ηn′=1ηn→d1ζ\eta_n=\frac{S_n-ES_n}{\sqrt{D(S_n)}}\xrightarrow{d}\zeta\sim N(0,1) \quad \Rightarrow \quad \eta_n'=\frac{1}{\eta_n}\xrightarrow{d}\frac{1}{\zeta} ηn​=D(Sn​)​Sn​−ESn​​d​ζ∼N(0,1)⇒ηn′​=ηn​1​d​ζ1​

从而 knηn′=D(Sn)n→0k_n\eta_n'=\frac{\sqrt{D(S_n)}}{n}\to 0kn​ηn′​=nD(Sn​)​​→0, 1n2∑k=1nD(ξk)→0\frac{1}{n^2}\sum_{k=1}^nD(\xi_k)\to0n21​∑k=1n​D(ξk​)→0.

例 设 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 为独立随机变量序列, 每个 ξn\xi_nξn​ 有分布 P(ξn=±nα)=12\mathcal{P}(\xi_n = \pm n^\alpha) = \frac{1}{2}P(ξn​=±nα)=21​. 试证:
(1) 当 α>−12\alpha > -\frac{1}{2}α>−21​ 时, {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 满足 CLT;
(2) 当 α>0\alpha > 0α>0 时, {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 服从大数定律的充要条件是 α<12\alpha < \frac{1}{2}α<21​.

证明
(1) 由题 Eξk=0E\xi_k = 0Eξk​=0, D(ξk)=n2αD(\xi_k) = n^{2\alpha}D(ξk​)=n2α, Bn2=∑k=1nk2αB_n^2 = \sum_{k=1}^n k^{2\alpha}Bn2​=∑k=1n​k2α, 由 2α>−12\alpha > -12α>−1, 取 δ>0\delta > 0δ>0 s.t. α(2+δ)≠−1\alpha(2+\delta) \neq -1α(2+δ)=−1, 于是

1Bn2+δ∑k=1nE∣ξk∣2+δ∼∫0nxα(2+δ)(∫0nx2αdx)1+δ2∼n−δ2→0asn→∞\frac{1}{B_n^{2+\delta}} \sum_{k=1}^n E|\xi_k|^{2+\delta} \sim \frac{\int_0^n x^{\alpha(2+\delta)}}{\left(\int_0^n x^{2\alpha}dx\right)^{1+\frac{\delta}{2}}} \sim n^{-\frac{\delta}{2}} \to 0 \quad as \quad n \to \infty Bn2+δ​1​k=1∑n​E∣ξk​∣2+δ∼(∫0n​x2αdx)1+2δ​∫0n​xα(2+δ)​∼n−2δ​→0asn→∞

从而 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 满足 Lyapunov 条件, 故满足 CLT.

(2) 由 (1), 此时 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 为独立的满足 CLT 的随机变量列, {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 满足 SLLN 当且仅当

1n2D(Sn)=1n2∑k=1nk2α∼n2α−1→0\frac{1}{n^2} D(S_n) = \frac{1}{n^2} \sum_{k=1}^n k^{2\alpha} \sim n^{2\alpha - 1} \to 0 n21​D(Sn​)=n21​k=1∑n​k2α∼n2α−1→0

此即 α<12\alpha < \frac{1}{2}α<21​.

例 设 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 独立同分布, Eξn=0E\xi_n = 0Eξn​=0, D(ξn)=1D(\xi_n) = 1D(ξn​)=1. 试证如下随机变量列为渐近正态分布的:

ηn=nξ1+⋯+ξnξ12+⋯+ξn2,ζn=ξ1+⋯+ξnξ12+⋯+ξn2\eta_n = \sqrt{n} \frac{\xi_1 + \cdots + \xi_n}{\xi_1^2 + \cdots + \xi_n^2}, \zeta_n = \frac{\xi_1 + \cdots + \xi_n}{\sqrt{\xi_1^2 + \cdots + \xi_n^2}} ηn​=n​ξ12​+⋯+ξn2​ξ1​+⋯+ξn​​,ζn​=ξ12​+⋯+ξn2​​ξ1​+⋯+ξn​​

证明 记 Sn=∑k=1nξkS_n = \sum_{k=1}^n \xi_kSn​=∑k=1n​ξk​, Tn=∑k=1nξk2T_n = \sum_{k=1}^n \xi_k^2Tn​=∑k=1n​ξk2​, 则 ESn=0ES_n = 0ESn​=0, D(Sn)=ETn=nD(S_n) = ET_n = nD(Sn​)=ETn​=n. 再由 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​}, {ξn2}\{\xi_n^2\}{ξn2​} 均独立同分布, 且 ξ1\xi_1ξ1​ 期望方差有限, ξ12\xi_1^2ξ12​ 期望有限, 故 {ξn}\{\xi_n\}{ξn​} 满足 CLT, {ξn2}\{\xi_n^2\}{ξn2​} 满足 SLLN, 也满足 WLLN, 那么

Snn→dN(0,1),Tnn→P1⇒nTn→P1⇒ηn=SnnnTn→dN(0,1)\frac{S_n}{\sqrt{n}} \xrightarrow{d} N(0,1), \quad \frac{T_n}{n} \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} 1 \Rightarrow \frac{n}{T_n} \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} 1 \Rightarrow \eta_n = \frac{S_n}{\sqrt{n}}\frac{n}{T_n} \xrightarrow{d} N(0,1) n​Sn​​d​N(0,1),nTn​​P​1⇒Tn​n​P​1⇒ηn​=n​Sn​​Tn​n​d​N(0,1)

Snn→dN(0,1),nTn→P1⇒ζn=SnnnTn→dN(0,1)\frac{S_n}{\sqrt{n}} \xrightarrow{d} N(0,1), \quad \sqrt{\frac{n}{T_n}} \xrightarrow{\mathcal{P}} 1 \Rightarrow \zeta_n = \frac{S_n}{\sqrt{n}} \sqrt{\frac{n}{T_n}} \xrightarrow{d} N(0,1) n​Sn​​d​N(0,1),Tn​n​​P​1⇒ζn​=n​Sn​​Tn​n​​d​N(0,1)
